field.name: jf_mainColor
field.label: Main Color Style
field.description: Choose Main Color Style - It contains only images, exactly 'Fast Navigation' and 'MiddlePanel' Icons. Also contains 'JF JS LatestMembers' tooltip border

field.name: jf_mainColor_1
field.label: Main Color 1
field.description: Colors for example: Menu item hover, Mouse Loader, Login Button Hover...

field.name: jf_mainColor_2
field.label: Main Color 2
field.description: Color for 'Recent Projects' hover line

field.name: jf_mainColor_3
field.label: Main Color 3
field.description: Color for 'Login Button'

field.name: jf_mainColor_4
field.label: Main Color 4
field.description: Color for 'Photo Gallery Hover Line'

field.name: jf_mainColor_5
field.label: Main Color 5
field.description: Colors for example: Article/K2 Author Link, Portfolio Item Readmore Link

field.name: jf_mainColor_6
field.label: Main Color 6
field.description: Colors for: Typography Accordions/Toggles Triggers hover

field.name: jf_mainColor_7
field.label: Main Color 7
field.description: Color for Menu on Active/Hover

field.name: jf_mainColor_8
field.label: Main Color 8
field.description: Color for Custom HTML 'Recent Projects' Button Hover

field.name: jf_mainColor_91
field.label: JS Main Color 9 (1)
field.description: 'JF Login' Greeteng Gradient: Top

field.name: jf_mainColor_92
field.label: JS Main Color 9 (2)
field.description: 'JF Login' Greeteng Gradient: Bottom

field.name: jf_mainColor_93
field.label: JS Main Color 9 (3)
field.description: 'JF Login' Greeteng Gradient: Border

field.name: jfku_override
field.label: Kunena Theme Color Override
field.description: If Enable, than it will override our Kunena Theme color styles

field.name: jfku_mainColor_1
field.label: KU Main Active Color
field.description: Choose Main Active Color (it contains all links, Menu Active Item color and so on...)

field.name: jfku_mainColor_2
field.label: KU Main Inactive Color
field.description: Choose Main Inactive Color (it contains for example, 'cancel' button color ...)

field.name: jfku_mainColor_31
field.label: KU Mob. Toolbar Grad. Top
field.description: Choose Mobile Toolbar Top Gradient Color

field.name: jfku_mainColor_32
field.label: KU Mob. Toolbar Grad. Bottom
field.description: Choose Mobile Toolbar Bottom Gradient Color

field.name: text
field.default:
The Kunena name and logo is used under a limited license granted by the Kunena Project, the trademark holder in the United States and other countries.
JoomForest.com is not affiliated with the Kunena Project.
The Joomla!™ name is used under a limited license from Open Source Matters in the United States and other countries.
JoomForest.com is not affiliated with or endorsed by Open Source Matters or the Joomla! Project.
Copyright © 2013 JoomForest.com. All Rights Reserved.
field.label: TEXT

field.name: jf_soundclickhover_hovertags
field.default: .rt-menubar a,.fusion-submenu-wrapper a,#jf-logomodalbutton,#jf-logomenu-items a,.jf-logomodalclose,#jsMenu a,#Kunena #ktab a,#jf_ku_header .jf_ku_modalbtn,#jf_kunena_login .jf_ku_login_imp_icon,#Kunena a.jf_kunena_announc_btn
field.label: JF_SOUNDCLICKHOVER_HOVER_TAGS

field.name: jf_soundclickhover_clicktags
field.default: .rt-menubar a,.fusion-submenu-wrapper a,#jf-logomodalbutton,#jf-logomenu-items a,.jf-logomodalclose,#jsMenu a,#Kunena #ktab a,#jf_ku_header .jf_ku_modalbtn,#jf_kunena_login .jf_ku_login_imp_icon,#Kunena a.jf_kunena_announc_btn
field.label: JF_SOUNDCLICKHOVER_CLICK_TAGS
